verbose_text: In addition, miR-193b could promote the proliferation capacity of gliomas cells through the transforming growth factor-beta (TGF-beta) pathway by regulating Smad3 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: miR-193b could promote the proliferation capacity of gliomas cells through the transforming growth factor-beta (TGF-beta) pathway by regulating Smad3
